extension.description: Watch all your favourite AU Freeview channels!. Change the region (default is Melbourne) in the addon settings.
extension.news:
0.1.0 (15/06/2018) - Rename add-on to IPTV AU + a lick of paint - Change 'Use Inpustream' to a per channel option (use context menu to add / remove) - Revert 'use xbmc.Player()' but still hopefully have no resume / watched statuses
0.0.9 (14/06/2018) - Change to use xbmc.Player().play() for live streams (disables annyoing resume / watched) - Re-write add-on to bring in-line with other add-ons - Update icon - Add new "Enable Inputstream" context menu item. This will make the add-on try to use Inputstream Adaptive to play the channel. Inputstream allows for faster playback. Note: It won't work on all streams - You can disable it via context menu.
